name: The Elder's Son
description:
This is a short RPG adventure that was started from an RPG Maker tutorial, and is my first officially released game! I used the stock assets from RPG Maker VX Ace, and it was a fun learning experience. It will probably take around 10 minutes to complete the game.

You play as Ryan, the village elder's son, who is thrust into helping an old acquaintance with a demon that has been re-summoned.

  • Game Instructions - Standard RPG Maker VX Ace settings:
    • Use the Arrow keys to move your player
    • Enter, Space, and Z to interact with NPCs and objects
    • Escape to open the menu
  • Installation Instructions
    • Download the .exe
    • Run the .exe and chose where you want to extract the files
    • Run the Game.exe in the folder where you extracted the files

Any constructive criticism is appreciated! Please keep in mind that I am still learning and writing/level design are not my strengths :D
